title: I'm officially done being a jungle main
body: Nerf after nerf after nerf. I can't do it anymore. If you don't play one of the top 3 jungles, it's so unrewarding to even attempt jungle anymore. So I'm done.

replies.body: I know your pain, I tried to get back into the new jungle with Hecarim, Rammus, Nautilus, Xin, tried Reksai for a bit but went back to Hecarim. Every one of these junglers got indirectly nerfed by the smite range decrease and they put forth so much effort to engage. So I just started playing {{champion:254}} and win.
Now I may be wrong, but I feel like a Jungle Main would just find another champion to play? If I was support and they nerfed so many champions, I would try to find one that fills the holes.
